page.qtext: You wake up in the morning and see a robot in your kitchen. What do you do?
After you say hi the robot says beep boop beep boop bop! Now what do you do?
The robot starts dancing too. Shake your robot booty! Now that the dance is over you're hungry for breakfast. What do you eat?
You go back to bed and fall asleep. The end!
You and the robot both laugh. Now you're feeling hungry, but what should you eat?
Nice high five. The robot asks if you want something for breakfast. What do you say?
You eat all of the cheerios and put your bowl on the counter near the sink. The robot asks what you'd like to do this morning.
Yum. Those rice krispies were delicious. Now that your belly is full what do you and the robot want to do?
The robot makes pancakes that are shaped like Mickey Mouse. After eating them you thank the robot for making breakfast. Now what do you want to do?
You and the robot ride bikes together all morning. After a lot of riding you get tired and decide to head back inside and take a nap. The end!
You and the robot have an awesome dance party. After a lot of dancing you get tired and decide to take a nap. The end!
